column5: Anybody here have the flyer for Bass Pro's 2007 Spring Fishing Classic (March 10 - 18, 2007)?  If so, would someone be kind enough to post it here?  Thanks!
See the other 2 or 3 threads that are already up on this....it's 40 pages..nobody is going to scan and post it.
By any chance would this be in the papers? ie. The Sun, Star, etc.?
That's for Americans.  We're talking for us Canadians here in Toronto.

Not sure what paper it was/is in...but if you read the thread I refered to you will see that Roger states that the BPS website will have it posted on Thur night..friday latest.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=4470
It will be in the Star Saturday,the Sun on Sunday.
